second part, do hereby grant and release unto the said party of the second part, <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">his</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">heirs</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="NONFAMILY">assigns</ENAMEX> forever,
all <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">their</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">me</ENAMEX>-half interest ( as described in the deed to <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Lloyd E.</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">David 
L. Brown</ENAMEX>, recorded <TIMEX TYPE="DATE">December 10, 1913</TIMEX>) in that certain Piece or Parcel of Land 
situate in the <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">City of Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of Erie</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">State of New York</ENAMEX>
distinguished as part of lot number fifty one in the eleventh Township 
and the eighth range of the <ENAMEX TYPE="ORGANIZATION">Holland Land Company</ENAMEX>'s survey and more
particularly bounded as follows, viz:- Being part of Lot number Ten on 
a subdivision map of the premises on file in the <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">Erie County</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="OCCUPATION">Clerk</ENAMEX>'s 
office and commencing on the westerly line of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Park street</ENAMEX> at the distance 
of <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">two hundred and fifty</NUMEX> feet northerly from the northerly line of 
<ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Allen Street</ENAMEX>, and running thence westerly at right angles with <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Park 
Street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">one hundred and thirty four</NUMEX> feet; thence northerly parallel 
with <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Park street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">thirty three</NUMEX> feet; thence easterly <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">one hundred and
thirty - four</NUMEX> feet to the westerly line of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Park street</ENAMEX>; Thence southerly on
the westerly line of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Park street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">thirty three</NUMEX> feet to the place of beginning.
Subject to mortgages, interest and taxes incumbering said premises, 
also, all that certain Piece or Parcel of land, situate, in
ining in the <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">City of Buffalo</ENAMEX>, <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of Erie</ENAMEX> and <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">State of New York</ENAMEX>, and
bounded and described as follows, to wit:-
Commencing on the easterly side of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Michigan Street</ENAMEX> <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">one hundred 
and one</NUMEX> feet north from the north side of <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">North Division Street</ENAMEX>. 
thence running northerly <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">thirty-two</NUMEX> feet on said <ENAMEX TYPE="STRUCTURE">Madigan Street</ENAMEX>,
Thence easterly at right angles <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">ninety two</NUMEX> feet to an alley, thence
southerly on said alley <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">thirty two</NUMEX> feet, thence westerly at right angles <NUMEX TYPE="QUANTITY">ninety 
two</NUMEX> feet to the place of beginning. Subject to mortgages, interest 
and taxes.
to <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Rhoda Brown</ENAMEX> in <ENAMEX TYPE="WORK_OF_ART">Liber 402 of Deeds</ENAMEX> at page 580, and by the said <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Rhoda Brown</ENAMEX>

or hereditaments in said <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">State of New York</ENAMEX>, that there is on file in the <ENAMEX TYPE="OCCUPATION">Clerk</ENAMEX>
office of In <ENAMEX TYPE="LOCALE">County of New York</ENAMEX>, a certified copy of <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">his</ENAMEX> appointment and

Public</ENAMEX>, and verily believe that the signature to said deposition, or certificate of
proof or acknowledgment is genuine.
In Testimony Whereof, <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">I</ENAMEX> have hereunto set <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF">my</ENAMEX> hand and affixed the seal of the <ENAMEX TYPE="COREF.loc">said Court</ENAMEX>
County this <TIMEX TYPE="DATE">26th day of Feb. 1918</TIMEX>. ( 10) <ENAMEX TYPE="PERSON">Wm Schneider</ENAMEX> <ENAMEX TYPE="OCCUPATION">Clerk</ENAMEX>
